::Shredder::

Shredder looks from Megatron to Waspinator, realizing that he had no hope of 
bargaining with the two bots. He growls.

"Follow me," he says to Waspinator and turns to walk out of the base, picking 
a random direction in the forest but glancing down at his scanner first to 
make it seem like he was following a signal.

There was no way he was going to give anyone anything without reward, not 
even Megatron. A plan begins to form in his mind. He would take Waspinator a 
distance out to the forest and shoot him in the back. Then he would go join a 
different group, or something to that extent.

He pauses at the exit of the base, waiting for Waspinator to follow him.
